com.bees4honey.vinscanner

Class B4HScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bees4honey.vinscanner.B4HScanner

  • public class B4HScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    B4HScanner class provides Java interface for native VIN Scanner libraries.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public java.lang.String parse(byte[] data,
                     int width,
                     int height,
                     android.content.Context context)
        Parse VIN code from given byte array.
        Parameters:
        data - the image captured from the Android camera and stored in NV21 format.
        width - the width of the image.
        height - the height of the image.
        context - current context.
        Returns:
        scanned code or NULL if VIN code is not found.

      • status

        public int status(android.content.Context context)
        Check status of scanner license
        Parameters:
        context - current context
        Returns:
        the int status value of the license.

      • getStatus

        public B4HScanner.SdkStatus getStatus(android.content.Context context)
        Get enum with human-readable scanner license status.
        Parameters:
        context - current status.
        Returns:
        enum value containing status of the library.

      • version

        public java.lang.String version()
        Get version of Bees4honey VIN scanner library. Method returns "2.0" value by default. NOTE: Method throws an exception, if library has too old version.
        Returns:
        Version of scanner library.
